name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Edward Warner HEARD, Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Edward Warner HEARD, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Based upon our decision in Commonwealth v. Albert, 563 Pa. 133, 758 A.2d 1149 (2000), the Order of the Allegheny County Common Pleas Court is reversed and the matter is remanded for further proceedings.
Jurisdiction is relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: James Robert Gilmore, Pittsburgh, for Commonwealth of PA.
Patrick J. Thomassey, Monroeville, for Edward Warner Heard.
casebody.head_matter:
764 A.2d 1054
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Edward Warner HEARD, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 13, 2000.
Decided Jan. 16, 2001.
James Robert Gilmore, Pittsburgh, for Commonwealth of PA.
Patrick J. Thomassey, Monroeville, for Edward Warner Heard.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
